thread.title: NHL 16: Roster Update Released (Now Includes Rookies)
thread.title_full: NHL 16: Roster Update Released (Now Includes Rookies)

author: ChaseB
title: NHL 16: Roster Update Released (Now Includes Rookies)
text: NHL 16: Roster Update Released (Now Includes Rookies) 05:50 PM - October 14, 2015 by ChaseB Now that the top rookies in the game have played in an NHL game, the silly rule that officially makes rookies "official" in the NHL means we now have the likes of Connor McDavid and Jack Eichel included in the game. We have not yet had the chance to dig too deep into this roster update, so let us know what else you find. If you're looking for where to download the roster, you'll want to head to the "customize" area, and from there you will have the option to download the latest roster to tweak to your liking.
